name: Raging
duration: 1 minute (10 rounds), or until ended early
description: In battle, you fight with primal ferocity. On your turn, you can enter a Rage as a Bonus Action. While Raging, you gain several benefits if you aren't wearing Heavy Armor.

effects.target: Strength checks and Strength saving throws

endConditions: Your turn ends and you haven't attacked a creature or taken damage since your last turn
You end it as a Bonus Action
restrictions: Cannot cast spells or concentrate on spells while Raging
Must not be wearing Heavy Armor to gain benefits
Rage Damage bonus only applies to melee attacks using Strength
notes: The Rage ends early if your turn ends and you haven't attacked a hostile creature since your last turn or taken damage. Certain Barbarian subclasses add additional effects while Raging.
